Summarise Forecast Rts

summarise_forecast.Rd

Summarise Forecast Rts

summarise_forecast(fit_samples)

Arguments

fit_samples

A dataframe as produced by EpiSoon::forecast.

Value

A summarised dataframe.

Examples



samples <- forecast_rt(example_obs_rts,
                       model = function(...) {EpiSoon::bsts_model(model =
                    function(ss, y){bsts::AddSemilocalLinearTrend(ss, y = y)}, ...)},
                       horizon = 7, samples = 10)


summarise_forecast(samples)
#> # A tibble: 7 x 9
#>   date       horizon median  mean     sd bottom lower upper   top
#>   <date>       <int>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 2020-03-23       1   1.52  1.51 0.0527  1.40   1.49  1.54  1.58
#> 2 2020-03-24       2   1.48  1.48 0.0807  1.32   1.44  1.49  1.62
#> 3 2020-03-25       3   1.44  1.43 0.0893  1.31   1.40  1.50  1.58
#> 4 2020-03-26       4   1.39  1.39 0.112   1.24   1.28  1.40  1.63
#> 5 2020-03-27       5   1.36  1.33 0.120   1.12   1.29  1.40  1.54
#> 6 2020-03-28       6   1.34  1.30 0.171   0.916  1.30  1.40  1.55
#> 7 2020-03-29       7   1.29  1.23 0.180   0.788  1.29  1.40  1.40
